<div data-module="govuk-password-input" data-i18n.show-password="Show" data-i18n.hide-password="Hide" data-i18n.show-password-aria-label="Show password" data-i18n.hide-password-aria-label="Hide password" data-i18n.password-shown-announcement="Your password is visible" data-i18n.password-hidden-announcement="Your password is hidden" class="govuk-form-group govuk-password-input gem-c-password-input govuk-!-margin-bottom-3">

<input name="user[password]" type="password" class="govuk-input govuk-password-input__input govuk-js-password-input-input" id="012b292e-password-input" spellcheck="false" autocomplete="current-password" autocapitalize="none">

<button type="button" class="govuk-button govuk-button--secondary govuk-password-input__toggle govuk-js-password-input-toggle" data-module="govuk-button" hidden="hidden" aria-controls="012b292e-password-input" aria-label="Show password">
